lexUnit.name: refuse.v

corpus.description: Wall Street Journal Texts from the PropBank Project
corpus.name: PropBank

corpus.description: Texts from Nuclear Threat Initiative website, created by Center for Non-Proliferation Studies
corpus.name: NTI

lexUnit.definition: COD: indicate unwillingness to accept or grant (something offered or requested)

sentence.text: He refused to send his horses to be shod at our smithy after that ; for once the smith 's verdict got around it would be difficult for him to sell the mare .
They refused to join forces and issue a UK paperback of The Satanic Verses .
Margaret Thatcher 's government so far refuses to listen to these ideas .
Managers at the Landing Gear factory have so far refused to confirm or deny the report that up to two hundred jobs are to go .
He has so far refused to indicate whether he intends to appeal .
They are refusing adamantly even to investigate thin slab technology .
Still , even when Grigorovich refused three years ago to let her guest at the Royal Ballet , she did what she was told .
A High Court judge refused to grant an injunction which would have forced publishers Methuen to remove the characters , drawn by former Daily Mirror cartoonist Griffin .
TREVOR FRANCIS last night refused to bring down the curtain on his playing career , even though Sheffield Wednesday chairman Dave Richards has begged him to bow out .

He refused to give details of the type , quantity and condition of the explosive or identify the ` terrorist paraphernalia " , although it is possible this might include timing devices or detonators .
First , she said , he offered her a puff from a ` funny cigarette " , which she refused .
At first all refused and then Miss Knox agreed on condition her two friends would follow .

Mr. Gonzalez and his colleagues , particularly the finance minister , Carlos Solchaga , are charged with having abandoned their socialist principles and with having become arrogant elitists who refuse even to go on television ( controlled by the state ) to face their accusers .
The vicar , W.D. Jones , refuses to talk about it , saying it would `` reopen the wound .
MG Rover is on the brink of collapse after Britain refused to provide $100 million in emergency funding and component suppliers withdrew their support , forcing the car-maker to halt production .
Second , there are reports that Kim Il Sung asked China to share its nuclear weapons technology following China 's first nuclear test in October 1964 , but Chairman Mao refused .
Ed_Henry : Reed refused to back down demanding the Republican led intelligence committee finish a long awaited report on whether the Bush administration twisted intelligence .
And this Republican led Senate intelligence committee refuses to even ask the hard questions about the misinformation -
With a premonition of his fate he had refused to take me with him .
